StartDocument(1.0, utf-8)
StartElement({urn:x}p:data [z=">"])
StartElement(a)
Characters("test")
EndElement(a)
StartElement(b)
Characters("kkss\" = ddd\' >")
EndElement(b)
Characters("<a>ddddd</b>!e3--><!-- ddckx")
StartElement(c)
EndElement(c)
Characters("<![CDATA[zzzz]]>")
EndElement({urn:x}p:data)
EndDocument
